mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HBOARD(HBOARD_NO, HBOARD_TITLE, HBOARD_CONTENT, COMPANY_NO, HBOARD_START, HBOARD_END, HBOARD_SALARY, HBOARD_EDUCATION, HBOARD_CAREER, HBOARD_LOCATION) VALUES(SEQ_HBOARD.NEXTVAL, #{hboardTitle}, #{hboardContent}, #{companyNo}, #{hboardStart}, #{hboardEnd}, #{hboardSalary}, #{hboardEducation}, #{hboardCareer}, #{hboardLocation})
INSERT INTO HRELATION(HBOARD_NO, TAGS_NO) VALUES(SEQ_HBOARD.CURRVAL, (SELECT TAGS_NO FROM TAGS T WHERE T.TAGS_NAME=#{tagsNo}))

INSERT INTO HATTACHMENT(HATTACHMENT_NO, HBOARD_NO, HATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, HATTACHMENT_CHANGE, HATTACHMENT_PATH, HATTACHMENT_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_HATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_HBOARD.CURRVAL, #{hattachmentOrigin}, #{hattachmentChange}, #{hattachmentPath}, #{hattachmentLevel})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HBOARD WHERE HBOARD_DELETE IS NULL

SELECT HBOARD_NO, HBOARD_TITLE, COMPANY_NAME AS "COMPANY_NO", HBOARD_VIEWS, TO_CHAR(HBOARD_INSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "HBOARD_INSERT", HBOARD_START, HBOARD_END, HBOARD_SALARY, HBOARD_EDUCATION, HBOARD_CAREER, HBOARD_LOCATION FROM HBOARD, COMPANY WHERE HBOARD_DELETE IS NULL ORDER BY HBOARD_NO DESC
SELECT HATTACHMENT_NO, HBOARD_NO, HATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, HATTACHMENT_CHANGE, HATTACHMENT_PATH, HATTACHMENT_INSERT, HATTACHMENT_LEVEL FROM HATTACHMENT WHERE HBOARD_NO=#{hboardNo} AND HATTACHMENT_LEVEL=1
SELECT HR.HBOARD_NO, T.TAGS_NAME AS "TAGS_NO" FROM HRELATION HR, TAGS T WHERE HR.TAGS_NO=T.TAGS_NO AND HR.HBOARD_NO=#{hboardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HWISHLIST WHERE HBOARD_NO=#{hboardNo} AND HWISHLIST_MEMBER=#{hboardContent}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HWISHLIST WHERE HBOARD_NO=#{hboardNo} AND HWISHLIST_MEMBER=#{hwishlistMember}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HWISHLIST WHERE HWISHLIST_MEMBER=#{hwishlistMember} AND HBOARD_NO=#{hboardNo}
